name: flare_smart_contracts
description: Smart contracts implementing FTSO on Flare Network.
author: Flare SC team

scripts.postinstall: echo Running install in flare-smart-contracts... && cd node_modules/flare-smart-contracts && yarn
scripts.test_unit_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/unit yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.test_integration_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/integration yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.clean: env rm -rf cache artifacts flattened typechain typechain-truffle
scripts.compile: yarn hardhat compile --config hardhatSetup.config.ts && yarn typechain-prepare && yarn typechain-ethers-v5 && yarn typechain-truffle-v5
scripts.slither: pip3 install slither-analyzer && rm -f ./slither.json 2> /dev/null; slither . --json=./slither.json 2> /dev/null || true; node node_modules/flare-smart-contracts/scripts/slither-parse.js ./slither.json
scripts.slither-show-stderr: pip3 install slither-analyzer && rm -f ./slither.json 2> /dev/null; slither . --json=./slither.json || true; node node_modules/flare-smart-contracts/scripts/slither-parse.js ./slither.json
scripts.full-deploy-hardhat-test: env NETWORK_CONFIG=hardhat yarn hardhat --network local test --no-compile deployment/test/test-deployed-contracts.ts
scripts.mock-deploy-hardhat: yarn hardhat --network local run deployment/test/scripts/mock-deploy-dependencies.ts && yarn full-deploy-hardhat && yarn hardhat --network local run --no-compile deployment/test/scripts/mock-deploy-fix-address-updater.ts && yarn full-deploy-hardhat-test
scripts.flare-sc-deploy-hardhat: yarn hardhat --network local run deployment/test/scripts/mock-deploy-stablecoins.ts && yarn full-deploy-hardhat && yarn full-deploy-hardhat-test
scripts.full-deploy-coston2-test: env NETWORK_CONFIG=coston2 yarn hardhat --network coston2 test --no-compile deployment/test/test-deployed-contracts.ts
scripts.gas-snapshot: env CI=true yarn testHH; yarn gas-report
